overview: Frank is an intergalactic time traveler with the ability to make peoplesâ€™ most secret wishes come to life. After his encouragment, a young couple get fitted out in shiny latex and rubber outfits and are then taken through a very funky, sex fetish horror fantasy. The participants in this dreamlike epic go through scenes of humiliating and degrading sexual encounters in which the darkest and most hidden sexual fantasies of men and women are brought to the surface. There is a remarkable award-winning performance from Steve Holmes who stars in this luxurious high-class production.
title: Funky Fetish Horror Show
